Minimalist Monogram Wedding Photo QR Code All In One Invitation

Hot Review! Minimalist Monogram Wedding Photo QR Code All In One Invitation – Wedding invitations Popular Minimalist Monogram Wedding Photo QR Code All In One Invitation help you save during this period Minimalist Monogram Wedding Photo QR Code All In One Invitation See more about itThis minimal photo wedding invitation features your own logo paired with fresh modern typefaces. Background color can be personalized as well. These professionally designed cards are quickly customizable.

This "roomy" invitation is a great way to give your guests additional information on the wedding. These cards can list the festivities surrounding your wedding weekend, such as welcome cocktails, after-parties, and morning after brunches. If you’re planning a destination wedding, all-in-one invitations are a great way to provide information to your guests about local hot spots and area attractions to help them make the most of their travel plans.

Using a QR code, there are endless possibilities you can make use of this technology and connect your guests to online information, display the information to their smartphone screens when the QR code is scanned. QR codes printed on wedding invitations is an excellent way to power up your traditional wedding cards to a more advanced, high-tech, and interactive version using the QR code technology!

Add your custom wording to this design by using the "Edit this design template" boxes on the right hand side of the item, or click the blue "Customize it" button to arrange the text, change the fonts and colors and to also add additional information or images to this design. Click "Customize Further" to open up full editing options. If you need any coordinating items, (thank you cards, etc.) please contact me for a custom order. ****For custom requests you need my help with, do not place this merchandise in your cart. Instead, email me your request at [email protected] A link to your merchandise will be emailed to you once the item is available. You can use that link to place your order. Please allow up to 48 hours. Price:$3.35
